languages.text: Большая часть поверхности покрыта ледяными дюнами в зеленоватых бликах. Сперва офицеры на борту корабля решают, что необычный цвет льда вызван особенностями атмосферы. Позже становится ясно, что источник бликов — исполинские пирамидальные строения, объятые изумрудным огнем. Сквозь линзы магнокуляров можно рассмотреть, что один из монолитов поврежден. Устройство на его стене испускает энергетический луч в такую же пирамиду неподалеку.

traits.locale_text: Внимание команды Вольного Торговца привлекают исполинские пирамидальные строения, объятые изумрудным огнем. Сквозь линзы магнокуляров можно рассмотреть, что один из монолитов поврежден и устройство, закрепленное на одной из стен, испускает энергетический луч в такую же конструкцию неподалеку.

languages.text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.
languages.original_text: Большая часть поверхности покрыта ледяными дюнами в зеленоватых бликах. Сперва офицеры на борту корабля решают, что необычный цвет льда вызван особенностями атмосферы. Позже становится ясно, что источник бликов — исполинские пирамидальные строения, объятые изумрудным огнем. Сквозь линзы магнокуляров можно рассмотреть, что один из монолитов поврежден. Устройство на его стене испускает энергетический луч в такую же пирамиду неподалеку.

traits.locale_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstruous pyramidal structures wreathed in emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, one can see that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

languages.text: 这颗行星大部分地表覆盖着带着绿色亮点的冰丘。起初，舰船上的军官官员以为冰块表面的异常颜色是由于大气的反射。但事实证明，光亮的来源是一群被绿宝石色火焰环绕的巨型金字塔状建筑。如果用扩视远镜仔细观察，可以看到其中一座巨型建筑已经被损坏了。这座建筑的墙上嵌着某种装置，正在向附近另一座类似金字塔的建筑发射能量束。
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星大部分地表覆盖着带着绿色亮点的冰丘。起初，舰船上的军官官员以为冰块表面的异常颜色是由于大气的反射。但事实证明，光亮的来源是一群被绿宝石色火焰环绕的巨型金字塔状建筑。如果用扩视远镜仔细观察，可以看到其中一座巨型建筑已经被损坏了。这座建筑的墙上嵌着某种装置，正在向附近另一座类似金字塔的建筑发射能量束。

languages.text: 地表の大部分は緑がかった氷の砂丘に覆われている。当初、船上の士官たちは、氷の異常な色は大気の異変によるものだと判断した。だが後に、その緑色はエメラルドの炎に包まれた怪物のようなピラミッド型の建造物群によるものであることが明らかになる。マグノキュラーで詳しく調べてみると、モノリスのひとつが破損していることがわかる。壁に設置された装置が、そう離れていない場所にある同じようなピラミッドに向けてエネルギービームを放っている。
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

traits.locale_text: 地表の大部分は緑がかった氷の砂丘に覆われている。当初、船上の士官たちは、氷の異常な色は大気の異変によるものだと判断した。だが後に、その緑色はエメラルドの炎に包まれた怪物のようなピラミッド型の建造物群によるものであることが明らかになる。マグノキュラーで詳しく調べてみると、モノリスのひとつが破損していることがわかる。壁に設置された装置が、そう離れていない場所にある同じようなピラミッドに向けてエネルギービームを放っている。

languages.text: La mayor parte de la superficie está cubierta de dunas heladas con brillos grisáceos. Al principio, los oficiales a bordo de la nave decidieron que el extraño color del hielo se debía a un defecto de la atmósfera. Más tarde, resultó evidente que el origen de los reflejos era un grupo de monstruosas estructuras piramidales envueltas en un fuego esmeralda. Examinándolas en detalle con unos magnoculares, se puede observar que uno de los monolitos está dañado. Un dispositivo situado en su pared emite un haz de energía hacia una pirámide similar cercana a ella.
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

traits.locale_text: La mayor parte de la superficie está cubierta de dunas heladas con brillos grisáceos. Al principio, los oficiales a bordo de la nave decidieron que el extraño color del hielo se debía a un defecto de la atmósfera. Más tarde, resultó evidente que el origen de los reflejos era un grupo de monstruosas estructuras piramidales envueltas en un fuego esmeralda. Examinándolas en detalle con unos magnoculares, se puede observar que uno de los monolitos está dañado. Un dispositivo situado en su pared emite un haz de energía hacia una pirámide similar cercana a ella.

languages.text: Der Großteil der Oberfläche ist mit eisigen Dünen bedeckt, die von grünen Flecken durchzogen sind. Zunächst beschließen die Offiziere an Bord des Schiffs, dass die ungewöhnliche Farbe des Eises auf eine Eigenart der Atmosphäre zurückzuführen ist. Später wird klar, dass die Ursache für die bunten Flecken eine Gruppe monströser pyramidaler Gebilde ist, die von einem smaragdgrünen Feuer umgeben sind. Wenn man sie mit einem Magnokular genauer betrachtet, stellt man fest, dass einer der Monolithen beschädigt ist. Ein Gerät an der Wand sondert einen Energiestrahl ab, der auf eine ähnliche Pyramide in der Nähe ausgerichtet ist.
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

traits.locale_text: Der Großteil der Oberfläche ist mit eisigen Dünen bedeckt, die von grünen Flecken durchzogen sind. Zunächst beschließen die Offiziere an Bord des Schiffs, dass die ungewöhnliche Farbe des Eises auf eine Eigenart der Atmosphäre zurückzuführen ist. Später wird klar, dass die Ursache für die bunten Flecken eine Gruppe monströser pyramidaler Gebilde ist, die von einem smaragdgrünen Feuer umgeben sind. Wenn man sie mit einem Magnokular genauer betrachtet, stellt man fest, dass einer der Monolithen beschädigt ist. Ein Gerät an der Wand sondert einen Energiestrahl ab, der auf eine ähnliche Pyramide in der Nähe ausgerichtet ist.

languages.text: La majeure partie de la surface est couverte de dunes de glace aux reflets verdâtres. Au départ, les officiers à bord du vaisseau présument que cette teinte inhabituelle est due à une anomalie atmosphérique, jusqu'à ce qu'ils s'aperçoivent que ce halo étrange provient d'un groupe d'immenses structures pyramidales enveloppées de flammes émeraude. Un examen plus approfondi à l'aide de magnoculaires révèle que l'un des monolithes est endommagé. Un dispositif aménagé dans sa paroi émet un rayon d'énergie dirigé vers une structure similaire proche.
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.

Au départ, les officiers à bord du vaisseau présument que cette teinte inhabituelle est due à une anomalie atmosphérique, jusqu'à ce qu'ils s'aperçoivent que ce halo étrange provient d'un groupe d'immenses structures pyramidales enveloppées de flammes émeraude. Un examen plus approfondi à l'aide de magnoculaires révèle que l'un des monolithes est endommagé. Un dispositif aménagé dans sa paroi émet un rayon d'énergie dirigé vers une structure similaire proche.

languages.text: Yüzeyin büyük bölümü, yeşilimsi buz tepecikleriyle kaplı. Gemideki subaylar, ilk başta bu olağan dışı renk tonunun atmosferik bir anomaliden kaynaklandığını düşünüyor. Sonrasında bu garip halenin, yeşim rengi alevlerle sarılı bir grup muazzam piramitsi yapıdan kaynaklandığını fark ediyorlar. Büyütürbünle daha yakından baktıklarında monolitlerden birinin hasarlı olduğunu görüyorlar. Monolit duvarına yerleştirilmiş bir cihaz, yakındaki benzer bir piramide yönlendirilmiş bir enerji ışını yayıyor.
languages.original_text: Most of the surface is covered in icy dunes with greenish highlights. At first, officers aboard the vessel decide that the unusual colour of the ice is due to a quirk of the atmosphere. Later, it becomes evident that the source of the highlights is a group of monstrous pyramidal structures wreathed in an emerald fire. Examining them in detail with magnoculars, it can be seen that one of the monoliths is damaged. A device on its wall emits an energy beam at a similar pyramid not far from itself.
